PYU.SH

Web Summary

Published on March 31, 2020

AIM: Read only headlines out of website/article.

For Public Use; drag this link to your bookmarks bar. This will convert any website to headlines. New url will be the format of ;

http://fosting.in:8080/function/sudoc?selector=h2&url=https://pyload.net/

Chnage selector to h1, h2, h3 to select required headlines.

Open source code available here! (usng openfaas to deploy this!)
